Instruction: Wash and dry the baby spinach leaves.
Slice the apricots into wedges and thinly slice the red onion.
In a large bowl, combine baby spinach, sliced apricots, sliced red onion, crumbled feta cheese, and almonds.
Drizzle balsamic vinaigrette over the salad and toss gently to coat.
Serve immediately as a refreshing side salad.
